title: C Programming
description: Master the fundamentals of the C programming language.

videos.title: Introduction to C
videos.notes: This video introduces the basics of the C programming language, including its history, features, and applications.

videos.title: Variables and Data Types
videos.notes: In this video, you'll learn about variables, data types, and how to declare and initialize them in C.

videos.title: Operators and Expressions
videos.notes: This video covers operators and expressions in C, including arithmetic, relational, logical, and bitwise operators.

videos.title: Control Flow Statements
videos.notes: Learn about control flow statements such as if, else, switch, and loops (while, do-while, for) in C.

videos.title: Functions
videos.notes: In this video, you'll explore the concept of functions in C, including function declaration, definition, and invocation.

videos.title: Arrays and Strings
videos.notes: This video covers arrays and strings in C, including array declaration, initialization, and manipulation.

videos.title: Pointers
videos.notes: Learn about pointers in C, including pointer declaration, dereferencing, pointer arithmetic, and their applications.

videos.title: Structures and Unions
videos.notes: Explore structures and unions in C, including their declaration, initialization, and accessing members.

videos.title: File Handling
videos.notes: In this video, you'll learn about file handling in C, including opening, reading, writing, and closing files.
